description: Rightmove Realtime Datafeed Json Schema for GetBrandEmails response

request_id.description: The unique ID of the request which this response is associated with

message.description: The message content for the response

success.description: Indicates whether or not the request was successful

request_timestamp.description: The time at which the request was received in the format: dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss

response_timestamp.description: The time at which the response was sent in the format: dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss

replication_lag.description: The current lag time for replicating between the three Rightmove data centres in minutes

export_period.description: The period for which emails are being exported

start_date_time.description: The start date/time for the export period in the format: dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss - this cannot be more than 28 days ago

end_date_time.description: The end date/time for the export period in the format: dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss - this cannot be more than 28 days ago

brand.description: Information about the brand for which the emails export is being generated

brand_id.description: Unique Rightmove ID for the brand for which the emails export is being generated

items.description: Details about which branch's emails are being retrieved

branch_id.description: Unique Rightmove ID for the branch for which the emails export is being generated

emails.description: Details of all the emails sent for the branch during the export period

email_id.description: Unique Rightmove identifier for this email

from_address.description: The email address which the email came from

to_address.description: The email address which the email was sent to

email_date.description: The date the original email was sent in the format: dd-MM-yyyy

email_types.description: A list of all the types the email sent belong to: 1 Request Viewing, 2 Request Appraisal, 3 Request Property Details, 4 Agent Valuation Request, 6 Email to Agent, 34 Multi agent email, 46 LVA lead, 47 Discover Valuation, 50 Opportunity Manager Valuation

user.description: Details about the user and their requirements

dpa_flag.description: Indicates whether the user wishes for their data to be protected

user_information.description: The information which the user provided within the email

move_date.description: The date the user is looking to move: 1 ASAP, 2 January, 3 February, 4 March, 5 April, 6 May, 7 June, 8 July, 9 August 10, September, 11 October, 12 November, 13 December

moving_reason.description: Why the user is looking to move

property_to_sell.description: Indicates whether the user has a property to sell: 1 No, 2 Yes, it is not on the market yet, 3 Yes, it is on the market already, 4 Yes, it is under offer, 5 Yes, it is already exchanged, 6 Yes

property_to_rent.description: Indicates whether the user has a property to rent: 1 No, 2 Not yet, I intend to buy to let, 3 Yes, it is available to let now, 4 Yes, it will be available to let soon, 5 Yes, it is currently occupied, 6 Yes

financial_advice.description: Indicates whether the user wants financial advice

part_exchange.description: Indicates whether the user is interested in part exchange

comments.description: Any further comments which the user has included

property.description: Details of the property which the email was linked to, if applicable

agent_ref.description: Agent's unique reference for the property

rightmove_id.description: Rightmove's unique reference for the property

rightmove_url.description: The Rightmove URL for the property

price.description: The current listed price for the property on Rightmove

postcode.description: The postcode provided for the property

bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms the property has

style.description: The style for the property listing - for New Homes Developments only

property_type.description: The type of the property: 0 Not Specified, 1 Terraced House, 2 End of terrace house, 3 Semi-detached house, 4 Detached house, 5 Mews house, 6 Cluster house, 7 Ground floor flat, 8 Flat, 9 Studio flat, 10 Ground floor maisonette, 11 Maisonette, 12 Bungalow, 13 Terraced bungalow, 14 Semi-detached bungalow, 15 Detached bungalow, 16 Mobile home, 20 Land, 21 Link detached house, 22 Town house, 23 Cottage, 24 Chalet, 26 House (unspecified), 27 Villa, 28 Apartment, 29 Penthouse, 30 Finca, 43 Barn Conversion, 44 Serviced apartment, 45 Parking, 46 Sheltered Housing, 47 Reteirment property, 48 House share, 49 Flat share, 50 Park home, 51 Garages, 52 Farm House, 53 Equestrian facility, 56 Duplex, 59 Triplex, 62 Longere, 65 Gite, 68 Barn, 71 Trulli, 74 Mill, 77 Ruins, 80 Restaurant, 83 Cafe, 86 Mill, 92 Castle, 95 Village House, 101 Cave House, 104 Cortijo, 107 Farm Land, 110 Plot, 113 Country House, 116 Stone House, 117 Caravan, 118 Lodge, 119 Log Cabin, 120 Manor House, 121 Stately Home, 125 Off-Plan, 128 Semi-detached Villa, 131 Detached Villa, 134 Bar/Nightclub, 137 Shop, 140 Riad, 141 House Boat, 142 Hotel Room, 143 Block of Apartments, 144 Private Halls, 178 Office, 181 Business Park, 184 Serviced Office, 187 Retail Property (High Street), 190 Retail Property (Out of Town), 193 Convenience Store, 196 Garages, 199 Hairdresser/Barber Shop, 202 Hotel Room, 205 Petrol Station, 208 Post Office, 211 Pub, 214 Workshop & Retail Space, 217 Distribution Warehouse, 220 Factory, 223 Heavy Industrial, 226 Industrial Park, 229 Light Industrial, 232 Storage, 235 Showroom, 238 Warehouse, 241 Land, 244 Commercial Development, 247 Industrial Development, 250 Residential Development, 253 Commercial Property, 256 Data Centre, 259 Farm, 262 Healthcare Facility, 265 Marine Property, 268 Mixed Use, 271 Research & Development Facility, 274 Science Park, 277 Guest House, 280 Hospitality, 283 Leisure Facility, 512 House of Multiple Occupation, 535 Sports facilities, 538 Spa, 541 Campsite & Holiday Village, 544 Retail Property (Shopping Centre), 547 Retail Property (Park), 550 Retail Property (Pop Up)

errors.description: The errors causing the request to fail

error_code.description: The unique Rightmove code for the error causing the request to fail

error_description.description: The full description of the error associated with the error code which has been generated

error_value.description: The value that caused this error

warnings.description: The warning generated by the request

warning_code.description: The unique Rightmove warning code generated due to failure to pass all of the business rules

warning_description.description: The full description of the warning associated with the warning code which has been generated

warning_value.description: The value that caused this warning
